releases.title: STAGE 1 - Luceo Genesis Praos Betanet
releases.description: At this stage of the project, Luceo will only implement the Genesis Praos consensus protocol. It'll be a fully decentralised network capable of transactions. A testnet will allow users to try out the currency. Companies and individuals may setup stakepools and encourage users to delegate their Luceo to them.

features.title: Luceo Genesis Praos Testnet
Objectives: Start Luceo Testnet in Genesis Praos mode

features.title: Luceo Genesis Praos Betanet
Objectives: Start Luceo Betanet in Genesis Praos mode

releases.title: STAGE 2 - Luceo Crypsinous Mainnet
releases.description: Luceo Crypsinous Mainnet brings to completion the privacy preserving extension for financial transactions. By this stage Genesis Praos should already be running for a sufficiently long time in Betanet. A snapshot of the existing Genesis Praos UTXO will be extracted and used to generate a new genesis block in Crypsinous mode.

features.title: Ouroboros Crypsinous
Objectives: Extend Luceo so that it supports privacy preserving functionality

features.title: Luceo Crypsinous Mainnet
Objectives: Upon completion of Ouroboros Crypsinous we launch Luceo Crypsinous Mainnet

releases.title: STAGE 3 - Applications
releases.description: The application layer builds out a platform for Luceo holders to create, buy and sell applications on an app marketplace. Fundamental to this is the implementation of the Named Data Networking (NDN) protocol in Rust. A front end for the NDN is needed as well as a frontend for Luceo users to make transactions. Lastly, a "killer app" is needed: By leveraging NDN which reduces data dissemination costs, users may stream pay per views without needing centralised tech giant monopolies like Youtube, thus creating demand for Luceo.

features.title: Named Data Networking (NDN)
Objectives: Utilize libp2p and implement Named Data Networking in Rust

features.title: Jolt - Jormungandr frontend
Objectives: Jolt is a Jormungandr frontend giving users a convenient frontend to manage a wallet

features.title: Puff - An NDN frontend
Objectives: Create an NDN frontend which executes applications obtained from the NDN

features.title: Pay per video stream application
Objectives: Utilize Named Data Networking to allow users to broadcast without using centralised streaming services like Youtube

features.title: Application marketplace
Objectives: An application marketplace allows users to buy and sell applications they create
